content:
Hello,
I wanted to see if anyone could get a review of some QR Codes we are developing for use in Immunization Registries before we deploy this code. The intent will be for this to out to 19 different Immunization Registries. For purposes of review, I just created the following test cases.

  • Delaware Immunization Registry
  • Connecticut Immunization Registry signed before a manual certificate renewal
  • Connecticut Immunization Registry signed after a manual certificate renewal
    Thanks in advance!
    CC: @JP Pollak , @Josh Mandel , @Ricky Bloomfield
    QRCode-Connecticut-after-manual-renewal.jpeg QRCode-Connecticut-before-manual-renewal.jpeg QRCode-Delaware.jpeg
I just tried scanning these and they all seemed to import just fine on iOS. @Pascal Pfiffner in case he wants to take a look as well. Thanks!
The only warning from the dev tool is that the QR codes could have been generated as v19, instead of hardcoded to v22.
these work well for us too! great work @Kevin Snow !
